price: 6. Mpe bazali kowela kosenga yo été mabe eyela bango noki, kasi bazali kowelela te kosenga bolamu. Mpe ya sólo, bitumbu ya ndenge wana esi esalami liboso na bango, mpe ya sólo, Nkolo nayo atonda bolimbisi тропа bato likolo ya mabe na bango, mpe ya soló, Nkolo nayo apesaka etumbu ya makasi.
arabic: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبۡلَ ٱلۡحَسَنَةِ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِهِمُ ٱلۡمَثُلَٰتُۗ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو مَغۡفِرَةٖ لِّلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ ظُلۡمِهِمۡۖ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَشَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wayastaʿjilūnaka bil-sayi-ati qabla al-ḥasanati waqad khalat min qablihimu al-mathulātu wa-inna rabbaka ladhū maghfiratin lilnnāsi ʿalā ẓul'mihim wa-inna rabbaka lashadīdu al-ʿiqābi
translations: And they ask you to hasten
